messages.title: putting local people first
messages.content: Labour will do whatever is necessary to support the economic recovery of Torbay. We will continue to invest in health, education and policing whilst reducing the budget deficit over four years. Labour is committed to supporting those in greatest need and protecting vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A job, training or work experience for every unemployed young person
To protect front line Public Services such as health and social care
To protect the elderly and those with disabilities
To ensure effective local measures exist to crack down on crime and anti-social behaviour

issues.economy: Labour will do whatever is necessary to support the economic recovery of Torbay.
issues.education: We will continue to invest in health, education
issues.health: We will continue to invest in health

leaflet.personalStatement: David is always doing something, attending meetings or writing in the paper. He cares and believes in improving our town.

endorsements.endorsement: David is always doing something, attending meetings or writing in the paper. He cares and believes in improving our town.
